author: aloeliger
body:
#### PR description:

This PR changes the L1T CICADA function model to be local the function where it is used, where it is hoped that the potential bug seen in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/44435, https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44397, https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44433. No change is expected to CICADA, however it is hoped that Trigger changes for AXOL1Tl might be seen (becoming more reasonable and removing the possible collision issue).

#### PR validation:

All code compiles and has had code formatting applied. Trigger results testing needs to be tested in conjunction with other PRs here (potentially).

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

This PR is not a backport, but if it proves to solve the issue, should be backported immediately.
title: Change CICADA model to be function local
